Name: The Alchemist's House
About the game: An invitation from a stranger... There's something evil in this house... Will you survive? . . . . . The Alchemist's House is a 3D interactive horror movie in a creepy medieval setting. Playtime is around 30 minutes to 1 hour. Please feel free to share your interpretation of the game!!!! :) Thank you so much for playing <3
